name: newsapp
0:
”Alexa ask news reader to get the news for california”
”Alexa ask news reader to read the news of mumbai”
”Alexa ask news reader to get the news for bangalore”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: news reader
des: Did you ever wonder what is currently happening in a particular city ? Well why not make Alexa smart enough to tell us the top news for the city you want. Just ask Alexa by saying 'Alexa ask news reader to get the news for New York' and Alexa will read the top 5 news for that place. Alexa gets this news from the Google News website.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
